ABOUT ME

I am a developer who enjoys working on front-end development but also sometimes can gets a kick out of back-end.

I am a Software Engineering student, Known for analysing problem and giving optimal solution & I enjoy learning everything I can while making cool stuff. I am really curious about learning server-side development .

I'm currently learning Node.js and React.js and have a strong foundation in JavaScript and web development. I've recently completed Modern Js web development bootcamp by The Net Ninja.

I am currently trying my hand at developing web apps. I would enjoy the opportunity to work/collaborate on projects

When I'm not coding, I enjoy spending time with books, family and some of my best friends or Playing Candy Crush Saga.
